author: Kishore

Did you know that you can shift between activities (ZUI) using shortcuts Ctrl+Shift+N for next activity and Ctrl+Shift+p for previous?

I know ZUI is not done yet but is capable of achieving similar. What i look forward when using it is that i can have a desktop more suitable for projection when I am giving a formal presentation and have my personal workspace otherwise. This already kinda works but is not perfect.

author: rememberme
message:
The solution is to assign shortcuts to the different activities. You could then have an "empty" containment and switch with a shortcut to your "monitor" / "fun" / whatever activity.
What you are proposing is just a duplication of the activities idea.
A shortcut for zooming out / in is obvious too. The graphical interface for switching between activities must become faster and feel more natural.
The ZUI is very basic right now but the possibilities are endless.
